iconUpload.confirmSvgDesc: Are you sure you want to use SVG images? To avoid XSS and XXE attacks, Lemon New Tab will process the image, so it may cause the SVG image not to be displayed as expected. But even after processing, you may still be attacked by the image you choose, so make sure the image source you use is safe.
